TopicSection.Content:
Spread.Views also supports the display of hierarchical data in grid using Tree Column.

Tree Column enables parent grid to get populated on page load but when the "plus or right arrow" is clicked, collection of the data & binding of the child grid is asynchronous and populated "on the fly" based on the value of the selected record.

Following are the two descriptors that helps grid to build data items as a tree:

  • parentField: indicates that the parent of each data record is stored in this property.
  • keyField: unique property that is used to find its parent item.
